Package pl.edu.agh.kis.pz1.game

Class Game

java.lang.Object
pl.edu.agh.kis.pz1.game.Game
public class Game extends Object
Game is a class of representation 5 Cards Daw Poker. A game object encapsulates all the most important features of game like:
  • Ante
  • All funds
  • Current max bet
  • Currently playing player
  • Current round of the game
  • Currently drawing player if it is a draw time.
  • Players participating in the game
  • Deck of 52 cards
Adds players to game and updates information about play.
Author:
Michał Strzeżoń

    • makeAMove

      public boolean makeAMove(int type, int wage, Player player)
      Makes a move of a player such as:
      • call
      • raise
      • fold
      Parameters:
      type - Type of move: 1->call, 2->raise, 3->fold
      wage - new wage - is needed to raise. In case of call or raise can be anything.
      player - The player to make the move.
      Returns:
      true if the move was successful; false otherwise.

    • isInGame

      public boolean isInGame(int id)
      Informs if the player is still playing the game or she/he folded.
      Parameters:
      id - id of player who is to be checked.
      Returns:
      true if the player is still playing. false otherwise.
